code: import React from'react';import{SIDE_NAV_WIDTH,SIDE_NAV_COLLAPSED_WIDTH,NAV_TYPE_TOP}from'constants/ThemeConstant';import{APP_NAME}from'configs/AppConfig';import{connect}from"react-redux";import utils from'utils';import{Grid}from'antd';var useBreakpoint=Grid.useBreakpoint;var getLogoWidthGutter=function getLogoWidthGutter(props,isMobile){var navCollapsed=props.navCollapsed,navType=props.navType;var isNavTop=navType===NAV_TYPE_TOP?true:false;if(isMobile&&!props.mobileLogo){return 0;}if(isNavTop){return'auto';}if(navCollapsed){return"".concat(SIDE_NAV_COLLAPSED_WIDTH,"px");}else{return"".concat(SIDE_NAV_WIDTH,"px");}};var getLogo=function getLogo(props){var navCollapsed=props.navCollapsed,logoType=props.logoType;if(logoType==='light'){if(navCollapsed){return'icici_logo_short.png';}return'icici_logo_short.png';}if(navCollapsed){return'icici_logo_short.png';}return'icici_logo_long.png';};var getLogoDisplay=function getLogoDisplay(isMobile,mobileLogo){if(isMobile&&!mobileLogo){return'd-none';}else{return'logo';}};export var Logo=function Logo(props){var isMobile=!utils.getBreakPoint(useBreakpoint()).includes('lg');return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:getLogoDisplay(isMobile,props.mobileLogo),style:{width:"".concat(getLogoWidthGutter(props,isMobile))}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{src:getLogo(props),alt:"".concat(APP_NAME," logo"),style:{width:props.navCollapsed?'40px':'225px',height:'45px'}}));};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(_ref){var theme=_ref.theme;var navCollapsed=theme.navCollapsed,navType=theme.navType;return{navCollapsed:navCollapsed,navType:navType};};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Logo);
